attributes.action: No to muzzle xl bully’s these dogs are not aggressive
attributes.additional_details: Keep dogs on proper leads but no muzzle is causes stress to dogs and totally unfair when other big dogs are not muzzled and can be aggressive along with small dogs any dog can bite no matter the size so why single these out because of a few bad owners
attributes.background: Not to muzzle innocent dogs and stress them for no reason when other big/small dogs are not being made to be muzzled out in public keeping dogs and leads should be enough and leads that are strong enough to hold these dogs

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for the same action:

Don’t require muzzles for XL Bullies - Not humane nor fair!
https://moderate.petition.parliament.uk/admin/petitions/644415
